metadata.title: AMAZING RETRO Haunted Mansion Shirt Adult Unisex T-Shirt Women Ladies Ghostly Haunted House
features: Unisex shirt, Shirt manufacturer may differ from image due to supply issues, cotton, comfortable, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem

Haunted Mansion Ghostly Bride, Haunted Mansion Wallpaper, Disney Haunted Mansion Shirt, Mickey Floral shirt. Perfect gift for the Disney lover in your family- Walt Disney World, Epcot, Animal Kingdom and Hollywood Studios

Please Note: Ordering Multiple/Different sizes of the same shirt to try on - could result in a restocking Fee of up to 20% on your return items. Please use our Picture Size guide we provide to assist in your purchase.

Our Haunted Mansion Mickey t-shirt is soft, lightweight, and breathable, so you can stay cool and comfortable at any theme park all day long. These shirts are sized to fit loosely - check out our size chart for measurements!

Made in the USA.You know what they say: go big or go home! We offer unisex sizing for babies, kids, youths, and adults so you can show off your Disney love with shirts for you and the hubby, friends, mommy-and-me outfits, or our personal favorite: matching shirts for your whole family!
description: DO DISNEY IN STYLE! Get ready to pack your bags, because this shirt is exactly what you need for your next Disney getaway. With Mickey on your front and a smile on your face, you will have everything you need to experience the true magic of Disney. Let us take care of your comfort and style so you can enjoy every Dole Whip and adventure with your family at the happiest place on Earth. FIT FOR COMFORT. Our boho floral Mickey t-shirt is soft, lightweight, and breathable, so you can stay cool and comfortable at any theme park all day long. These shirts are sized to fit loosely - check out our size chart for measurements! THE MORE THE MERRIER! You know what they say: go big or go home! We offer unisex sizing for babies, kids, youths, and adults so you can show off your Disney love with shirts for you and the hubby, friends, mommy-and-me outfits, or our personal favorite: matching shirts for your whole family! THINK BIG, SHOP SMALL! Our shirts are proudly made in the USA. As a small family business, we cannot thank you enough for your support!
